long_description: Kick back and relax after a long day on the trail, or enjoy a picnic, campout or summer concert with the portable Alite Monarch Butterfly Chair. At only 1 lb. 1. 6 oz., the Monarch Butterfly Chair is light enough to take along on backpacking trips; stows in its 4.5 x 12 in. stuff sack for easy carrying and storage. Chair sets up quickly and easily using an aluminum hub and pole system similar to the design found in many lightweight tents. Balancing on the 2 rubber feet allows you to rock forward and back. Lightweight nylon fabric features breathable mesh panels on the sides. Alite Monarch Butterfly Chair has a maximum capacity of 250 lbs.
short_description: Kick back and relax after a long day on the trail, or enjoy a picnic, campout or summer concert with the portable Alite Monarch Butterfly Chair.
